overview:
Alex Churchill is the CEO and founder of VonChurch.

Founded in 2008 VonChurch are the largest digital entertainment staffing agency covering the rapid Social start up combined with MMO, Console and interactive content creation divisions. VonChurch now has offices covering North America and Europe. VonChurch have helped some of the most exciting Silicon Valley start ups including CrowdStar, Kabam, Brooklyn Packet, Lionside, PopCap etc.

Alex has 20 years of start-up and international leadership experience at high growth niche markets including ERP (SAP, PeopleSoft and Oracle), Social and entertainment companies growing and helping leading staffing companies such as Montreal Assocaites, K2 Partnering Solutions and VonChurch.

Prior to VonChurch A;ex worked at Montreal Associates. Here he was promoted to the Managing Partner. The company saw a 142% growth results in a 4-year period under his leadership, streamlined the company into purely ERP, opened international teams to service local languages and took the company from revenues from GBP7 Million to a GBP 28Million.

K2 Partnering Alex helped the company move into the USA. He hndbuilt the West coast practise and under his guidence took West Coast practise from $0 - $9 Million Trevenue within 24 months and help guide K2 to $200 Million revenues.
